gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `InvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipants` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `InvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipants` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `InvestmentsMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InvestmentsMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_InvestmentsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_InvestmentsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfInvestmentsMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfInvestmentsMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfInvestmentsMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfInvestmentsMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende domeinleden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende domeinleden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
